definition: to exert influence or to have an impact on someone or something; commonly used to describe the act of influencing or affecting someone's thoughts, opinions, decisions, or actions.
examples: Ich möchte gerne meine Entscheidung beeinflussen.
I would like to influence my decision.
Die Medien können die öffentliche Meinung beeinflussen.
The media can influence public opinion.
Seine Worte haben mich stark beeinflusst.
His words have strongly influenced me.
